law.text: The provisions of KRS 365.800 to 365.840 shall apply to all retail agreement contracts entered into before June 25, 2013, which have no expiration date and are a continuing contract, and all other contracts entered into or renewed on or after June 25, 2013. Any contract in force before June 25, 2013, which by its own terms will terminate on a date after June 25, 2013, shall be governed by the law as it existed prior to June 25, 2013.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 9, effective April 21, 2004. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 9, effective February 28, 1986.
